title: Dodge your debts
brief_description: A fast paced slapstick farce starring Gaylord Lloyd (Harold Lloyd’s brother). Set in England, involves a debt collector, scores of bobbys, a pub, a thug and his beautiful daughter. Cast also includes William Gillespie, Estelle Harrison, George Rowe.
